comments.content:
Kabel Bold. It appears bolder because of the printing but the Ultra weight lops off the points on the Ms.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-kabel/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204124046/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-kabel/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-kabel/")
